content: I don't have access to real-time information about reservations at banff hot springs. however, it is always best to check ahead of time whether reservations are required, especially during peak travel season. banff upper hot springs usually accepts walk-ins from 10 am to 9 pm, with last entry at 8:15 pm. however, during peak season (june to september and december to january), it is recommended to reserve your spot ahead of time to avoid long wait times. radium hot springs requires reservations for the time being due to covid-19 protocols. it is recommended to check their website or call ahead of time for more information about reservations and current restrictions.
